question:
You have bought a new laptop computer and in a few days of purchase discovered amajor flaw, write a letter to the
Company In your letter
- Intoduce yourself
- explain the situation
- say what action you would like to company to take.
text: I am writing to express my dissatisfaction with my purchase of Macbook Pro laptop on, June 1 2022, at your chadstone store . I am one of your premium member customer, that applied for Industrial discount for the same.
For your reference and records, kindly refer to the details of the laptop:
Its a grey color, 13 inch macbook Pro 2021 model with Intel core i5. The keypad is without the touch bar and the serial number is 50T23HY2345T.

Please note, the major faults witnessed : Firstly, the keypad has some insignificant draws to the their operations. For instance, the letter L,B,W,H and arrow keys are not tapping. Secondly, there has been problem arising with the temperature of the laptop. After using for just 15 minutes, the bottom side of the laptop heat up real quick.

To which, I would like you to arrange an appointment in your chadstone outlet so that, you can inspect and provide a valuable soultion to the current problem. Also to mention, I still hold a warranty so I hoping if you can provide a replacement for the same model.
Looking forward to hearing from you!
